name: dojo
description: Dojo core is a powerful, lightweight library that makes common tasks quicker and easier. Animate elements, manipulate the DOM, and query with easy CSS syntax, all without sacrificing performance.

inlineEdit.helpText: If you use any markup characters (<,>,&), you need to specify whether the text represents literal (plain) text or HTML markup that should be parsed (using an innerHTML assignment).

widgets.name: Memory
widgets.description: This is a basic in-memory object store. It implements dojo.store.api.Store.

inlineEdit.helpText: If you use any markup characters (<,>,&), you need to specify whether the text represents literal (plain) text or HTML markup that should be parsed (using an innerHTML assignment).
